column4: anyone else get this error when trying apt-add install elementary-desktop? E: Couldn't find package elementary-desktop
elementary-desktop doesn't exist in the repository
I don't know what you're trying to install, but it doesn't exist in the repositories
okay, then sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get install packagenamehere
but when I type install elementary-desktop, i don't get anything back
make sure to refresh your package list first
i did, nothing though. are you able to download it?
no, I haven't tried, make sure your syntax is correct: sudo apt-get install elementary-desktop
I don't know, perhaps get ahold of the ppa maintainer, then
how do i remove a ppa?
